name: Monastery of the Distressed Body Monk

items.name: Hooked Polearm
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 10}). Until this grapple ends, the monk cannot use its polearm on another target.
